snippet: Prime Minister Tony Abbott said ahead of a visit to India that a uranium sale deal would help support “the world’s emerging democratic superpower.”
abstract: Australian Prime Min Tony Abbott hopes to sign deal to export uranium to India, even though India has not ratified the Nuclear Nonproliferation Treaty.

byline.original: By NIDA NAJAR and MICHELLE INNIS
byline.contributor: Nida Najar reported from New Delhi, and Michelle Innis from Sydney, Australia.

lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Tony Abbott said ahead of a visit to India that a uranium sale deal would help support “the world’s emerging democratic superpower.”

headline.main: Australian Leader Seeks Deal to Sell Uranium to India
headline.print_headline: Australian Leader Seeks Deal to Sell Uranium to India

keywords.value: Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament
keywords.name: subject
